venue.name: Boston Center for the Arts - Cyclorama

item.description:
250 Different Wines from around the world + DJ + Photobooth + Lounge = AWESOME.

Come to the Wine RIOT at the Cyclorama ( Center for the Arts in South End) for the opportunity to sample over 250 different wines!! This is the perfect chance to meet with other couples while tasting and learning about great wines.

If you'd love to taste a variety wines in a fun, non-pretentious atmosphere ... this event is for you.

Meet us in the cyclorama lobby between 6:45-7:15pm. If your going to be later , you can text or call me (Ben) at 407.491.9344 and I will come find you!

It is easily T accessible. See details here: http://www.thewinerio... Please don't drive!.

Purchase tickets online at the Wine Riot website. Purchase before March 7th to purchase the ticket for $40, anything purchased after that date will be $45.

"Included in admission to The Second Glass Wine Riot you can sample all 250 wines, access any of the Crash Course seminars, have your photo taken in The Second Glass photo booth, score free schwag and learn tons of new wine info! Wine Riot is only one weekend so be sure to book your tickets in advance!"


CHEERS!
item.name: the WINE RIOT !!
